response.overview: Despondent over the closing of his karate school, Cobra Kai teacher John Kreese joins a ruthless businessman and martial artist to get revenge on Daniel and Mr. Miyagi.
response.tagline: First it was teacher to student. Then it was father to son. Now, it's man to man.
response.title: The Karate Kid Part III

titles.title: Karate Kid III - La Sfida Finale
